title: Beagle in a Basket
description: Robbie the beagle is really missing his devoted companion, Martha the tabby cat. Before she passed away, Martha and Robbie shared everything - including their basket. Robbie is so upset, he's making himself ill. His owner, Geraldine O'Meara, is very worried. She couldn't bear to lose Robbie too! Can Mandy and James help find a way to make Robbie happy again?
author: Lucy Daniels
